description:
Shoot. Sketch. Share.

It’s official: Now we work with Muzy!

uSketch is the best tool for creating sketches from your images.
With a very intuitive and simple interface, uSketch allows you to take a photo, select the sketch you like better and share it right away.
You can't do it easier!

Features:
=============

 * works on iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch with iOS version 4.0 and up
 * dedicated design for iPad
 * full Retina display support
 * 12 sketch effects
 * open image from Photo Library / take picture with camera
 * share on Twitter, Facebook, Flickr, Muzy, email, save
 * print via AirPrint
 * fullscreen mode
 * landscape and portrait modes
 * high resolution images supported (up to 2400x1600)
 * easy to use
 * get rid of the ads using In-App purchase

Got the image? We've got the sketch!
Enjoy!
releaseNotes:
- Three new sketch effects: Pen, Ink and Stamp!
- Full Retina display support
- Integrated with Muzy.com - you can now share on Muzy!
- Fixed iOS 5.x compatibility issues
- Twitter integration for iOS 5+
- Switched to Photobucket as Twitter photo repository 
- Integrated a newer Flickr API together with updated OAuth authentication
- Small fixes and changes to the UI
- Removed support for iOS 3.x
- Fixed all the bugs that we knew about
